short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Groups tabs to the right of the current tab with a tab group that has a user-selected name and color.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension allows the user to link their related tabs through tab groups. The user can access the extension via a keyboard shortcut and enter a name and color, and can do this for multiple sets of related tabs in order to keep them organized.

This extension helps increase productivity by keeping users' browsers clean and organized, allowing them to file away sets of tabs for later use without having to switch between different windows.
